Headline: Howard-bound Red Line Service Delayed at 47th
ShortDescription: Correction: Howard-bound Red Line trains are standing at 47th due to an unauthorized person on the tracks. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Correction: Howard-bound Red Line trains are standing at 47th due to an unauthorized person on the tracks.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
